about.missionText: At Leaguer, we believe in bringing sports communities together. Our platform connects athletes, teams, and sports enthusiasts, providing tools to organize, participate, and excel in various sporting activities.
about.teamManagementDesc: Create and manage sports teams, track player statistics, and organize team activities.
about.eventOrganizationDesc: Organize tournaments, matches, and sporting events with easy scheduling and management tools.
about.communityBuildingDesc: Connect with fellow athletes, share experiences, and build lasting relationships within the sports community.
about.excellenceDesc: Striving for the best in everything we do
about.communityDesc: Building connections that last beyond the game
about.innovationDesc: Using technology to enhance the sports experience
about.inclusivityDesc: Welcoming athletes of all levels and backgrounds
about.contactText: Have questions or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you! Contact our team for support, partnerships, or general inquiries.

features.title: Powerful Features for Sports Communities
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage, organize, and grow your sports community
features.teamManagementDesc: Create and manage teams, track player rosters, monitor performance statistics, and organize team activities with ease.
features.eventOrganizationDesc: Schedule tournaments, matches, and training sessions. Send automated reminders and manage event logistics seamlessly.
features.communicationDesc: Stay connected with instant messaging, team announcements, and group chats. Never miss important updates.
features.analyticsDesc: Track detailed statistics, analyze performance trends, and generate comprehensive reports for players and teams.
features.tournamentsDesc: Create and manage tournaments with bracket generation, score tracking, and automated scheduling.
features.mobileAppDesc: Access all features on the go with our native mobile apps for iOS and Android devices.
features.liveTrackingDesc: Real-time score updates, live commentary, and instant match statistics.
features.integrationDesc: Connect with popular fitness trackers, payment systems, and social media platforms.
features.securityDesc: Enterprise-grade security with data encryption, secure authentication, and privacy controls.
features.getStartedDesc: Join thousands of sports communities already using Leaguer to manage their teams and events.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need support? We're here to help! Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

info.title: Contact Information
info.emailDesc: Get help with your account, billing, or technical issues
info.responseTimeDesc: We respond to all inquiries within one business day
info.supportDesc: Our support team is here to help during business hours

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
form.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters long
form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.noResults: No articles found for your search.
helpCenter.noResultsSuggestion: Try different keywords or check out our popular articles below.

howToCreateAccount.question: How do I create an account?
howToCreateAccount.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner of our homepage. Fill in your email, create a password, and verify your email address to get started.

howToJoinTeam.question: How do I join a team?
howToJoinTeam.answer: You can join a team by receiving an invitation from a team manager or by searching for public teams in your area. Go to 'Teams' in your dashboard and use the search function or browse available teams.

profileSetup.question: How do I set up my profile?
profileSetup.answer: After creating your account, go to your profile settings to add your personal information, sports preferences, skill level, and profile picture. A complete profile helps other players and teams find you.

changePassword.question: How do I change my password?
changePassword.answer: Go to your Account Settings, click on 'Security', and select 'Change Password'. You'll need to enter your current password and then create a new one.

updateEmail.question: How do I update my email address?
updateEmail.answer: In your Account Settings, go to 'Personal Information' and click 'Edit' next to your email address. You'll need to verify the new email address before the change takes effect.

notificationSettings.question: How do I manage my notification preferences?
notificationSettings.answer: Visit your Account Settings and click on 'Notifications'. Here you can choose which types of notifications you want to receive via email, push notifications, or SMS.

createTeam.question: How do I create a new team?
createTeam.answer: Go to your dashboard and click 'Create Team'. Fill in your team details including name, sport, location, and team description. You can then invite players to join your team.

invitePlayers.question: How do I invite players to my team?
invitePlayers.answer: As a team manager, go to your team page and click 'Invite Players'. You can send invitations by email or share your team's invite code with potential members.

manageRoster.question: How do I manage my team roster?
manageRoster.answer: In your team management panel, you can view all team members, assign roles (captain, co-captain), manage player status (active, inactive), and remove players if necessary.

loginIssues.question: I can't log into my account
loginIssues.answer: First, check that you're using the correct email and password. If you've forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link. If issues persist, clear your browser cache or try a different browser.

notificationsNotWorking.question: I'm not receiving notifications
notificationsNotWorking.answer: Check your notification settings to ensure they're enabled. Also verify your email address is correct and check your spam/junk folder. For mobile notifications, ensure the app has permission to send notifications.

performanceIssues.question: The app is running slowly
performanceIssues.answer: Try refreshing the page or restarting the app. Clear your browser cache and ensure you have a stable internet connection. If problems persist, try using a different browser or updating your current one.

subscriptionPlans.question: What subscription plans are available?
subscriptionPlans.answer: We offer Free, Premium, and Team plans. The Free plan includes basic features, Premium adds advanced analytics and priority support, while Team plans include additional management tools and higher limits.

changePaymentMethod.question: How do I update my payment method?
changePaymentMethod.answer: Go to your Account Settings, select 'Billing', and click 'Payment Methods'. You can add a new card, update existing payment information, or set a different card as your primary payment method.

refundPolicy.question: What is your refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid subscriptions. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund.

dataProtection.question: How do you protect my personal data?
dataProtection.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. We never sell your personal information and only share data as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: To delete your account, go to Account Settings, select 'Privacy & Security', and click 'Delete Account'. Note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone.

whoCanSeeProfile.question: Who can see my profile information?
whoCanSeeProfile.answer: You can control your profile visibility in Privacy Settings. You can choose to make your profile public, visible to team members only, or completely private.

contactSupport.title: Need More Help?
contactSupport.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: At {{companyName}}, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our sports community platform.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.text: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register for an account, create a profile, join teams, or contact us. This may include:

items.name: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
items.profile: Profile information (age, sports preferences, skill level)
items.photos: Profile photos and other images you upload
items.location: Location information (if you choose to share it)

automaticInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticInfo.text: We automatically collect certain information when you access and use our platform:

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.text: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

items.provide: To provide, operate, and maintain our platform
items.improve: To improve, personalize, and expand our services
items.communicate: To communicate with you and provide customer support
items.connect: To help you connect with other players and teams
items.notifications: To send you notifications about your account and activities
items.security: To monitor and analyze usage patterns for security purposes
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

items.service: With trusted service providers who assist us in operating our platform
items.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
items.business: In connection with a business transfer or merger

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.text: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: Access and review your personal information
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal information
items.restrict: Restrict or object to certain processing of your information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our platform. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

childrens.title: Children's Privacy
childrens.text: Our platform is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.text: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

footer.text: By using {{companyName}}, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to the collection and use of your information as described herein.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to {{companyName}}! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our sports community platform and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By creating an account, accessing, or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use our services.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.text: To use our services, you must:

items.age: Be at least 13 years old (or the minimum age required in your jurisdiction)
items.capacity: Have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement
items.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
items.accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information during registration

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration and Security
accountRegistration.text: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current. You are responsible for:

items.security: Maintaining the security of your account and password
items.activities: All activities that occur under your account
items.notify: Immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use of your account
items.update: Keeping your account information accurate and up-to-date

useOfServices.title: Use of Services
useOfServices.text: Our platform provides tools and services to help you connect with other sports enthusiasts, create and join teams, and participate in sports activities. You may use our services for lawful purposes only.

items.connect: Connect with other players and teams
items.participate: Participate in sports activities and events

items.illegal: Use the platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
items.harass: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
items.spam: Send spam, unsolicited communications, or engage in commercial activities
items.impersonate: Impersonate others or provide false information
items.violate: Violate any laws, regulations, or third-party rights
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the platform or servers

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.text: You may submit, upload, or post content on our platform ("User Content"). You retain ownership of your User Content, but you grant us certain rights to use it.

license.title: License to User Content
license.text: By submitting User Content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute your content in connection with our services.

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
responsibilities.text: You are solely responsible for your User Content and must ensure that it:

items.legal: Does not violate any laws or regulations
items.rights: Does not infringe on third-party rights
items.appropriate: Is appropriate and not offensive or harmful

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.text: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.text: The platform and its content, features, and functionality are owned by {{companyName}} and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

payments.title: Payments and Subscriptions
payments.text: Some features of our platform may require payment. By making a payment, you agree to our billing terms and policies.

items.authorization: You authorize us to charge your payment method for applicable fees
items.accuracy: You are responsible for providing accurate payment information
items.cancellation: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings
items.refunds: Refunds are subject to our refund policy

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.text: Our services are provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, {{companyName}} shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice. You may also terminate your account at any time.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where our company is incorporated, without regard to conflict of law principles.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated Terms on our platform and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

footer.text: By using {{companyName}}, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms of Service and agree to be bound by them.

introduction.title: What Are Cookies?
introduction.text: This Cookies Policy explains how {{companyName}} uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our sports community platform. We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content.

whatAreCookies.title: Understanding Cookies
whatAreCookies.text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your visit, such as your preferred settings and login status, which can make your next visit easier and the site more useful to you.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.text: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, helping us understand and improve performance.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.text: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings.

targeting.title: Targeting Cookies
targeting.text: These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements and marketing content based on your interests and behavior.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.text: We may use third-party services that set cookies on our website. These services help us provide better functionality and analyze website performance.

items.analytics: Google Analytics for website analytics and user behavior tracking
items.social: Social media platforms for sharing and integration features
items.payment: Payment processors for secure transaction handling

duration.title: How Long Do Cookies Last?
duration.text: Cookies have different lifespans depending on their purpose:

session.title: Session Cookies:
session.text: These are temporary and are deleted when you close your browser

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies:
persistent.text: These remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them

longTerm.title: Long-term Cookies:
longTerm.text: Some cookies may last up to 2 years to remember your preferences

managing.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.text: You have several options for managing cookies on our website:

consent.title: Cookie Consent Banner
consent.text: When you first visit our website, you will see a cookie consent banner where you can choose which types of cookies to accept or reject.

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.text: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:

items.disable: Disable all cookies (may affect website functionality)
items.notify: Get notifications when cookies are set

browserInstructions.title: Browser-Specific Instructions
browserInstructions.text: Here are links to cookie management instructions for popular browsers:

impact.title: Impact of Disabling Cookies
impact.text: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect your experience on our website:

items.functionality: Some features may not work properly or may be unavailable
items.personalization: Personalized content and recommendations may not be displayed
items.preferences: Your preferences and settings may not be remembered
items.analytics: We may not be able to improve our services based on usage patterns

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.text: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our business practices. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookies Policy, please contact us:

footer.text: By continuing to use {{companyName}}, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Cookies Policy and consent to our use of cookies as described herein.

messages.login_success_remembered: Successfully logged in. You will stay signed in.
